snippet: President Obama took to the road again in the fiscal debate, touring a German-owned truck factory in Michigan where a new investment of $120 million was announced.
abstract: Pres Obama takes to the road again in fiscal debate, pressing his case for higher tax rates for the richest Americans; declares his economic program will cut deficit without destroying the job market; Obama tours German-owned truck factory in Michigan where a new investment of $120 million is announced.
lead_paragraph: President Obama took to the road again in the fiscal debate, touring a German-owned truck factory in Michigan where a new investment of $120 million was announced.

headline.seo: Obama Tours Detroit Diesel and Calls for Higher Taxes for Richest
headline.main: Obama, With Blue-Collar Backdrop, Pushes for Higher Taxes on the Richest
headline.print_headline: Obama, With Blue-Collar Backdrop, Presses Case for Higher Taxes on the Richest
